name: donutclickergame
description: **Donut Clicker** is an addictive, incremental clicker game where you bake donuts, purchase upgrades, and build an empire of donut production! Similar to the popular **Cookie Clicker**, in Donut Clicker, your goal is to grow your bakery by earning donuts with each click and unlocking upgrades and items that automate your donut production.
